document_data.name: Dragon Blight
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dragon blight''''' was a spell that was used against [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, a shimmering green cloud enveloped a target dragon. The dragon, and any other dragonkind within the cloud, experienced excruciating pain, a pain so intense that any creature within was left stunned after the spell expired.
document_data.Components: This spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components. However, if the caster included a claw from a [[deep dragon]] while casting the spell, it  increased the likelihood of the spell stunning the targeted dragon.
